history.proof: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime in H. qsimpl use: rel_prime_sym. qsimpl use: Zdivide_intro,rel_prime_sym. qsimpl use: Zdivide_intro,rel_prime_sym. qsimpl use: Zdivide_intro,rel_prime_bezout,rel_prime_sym. qsimpl use: Zdivide_intro,rel_prime_bezout,rel_prime_sym,bezout_rel_prime. qsimpl use: Z,rel_prime_bezout,rel_prime_sym,Zdivide_intro,bezout_rel_prime,rel_prime_le_prime. hauto lq: on use: rel_prime_div, Zgcd_1_rel_prime, Z.divide_factor_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1853 ?M1852 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".
In environment H0 : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "exists z : Z, ?M2079 = z * ?M2078" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

In environment H2 : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x H1 : forall a b q : Z, b = q * a -> (a | b) a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M2401 ?M2400 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

In environment H3 : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x H0 : forall a b q : Z, b = q * a -> (a | b) a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Bezout ?M2722 ?M2723 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

In environment H4 : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x H2 : forall a b : Z, rel_prime a b -> Bezout a b 1 H1 : forall a b q : Z, b = q * a -> (a | b) a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M3116 ?M3117 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

exceptions.tactic: apply rel_prime_le_prime with (p := Z.gcd a b).

original: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime in H. apply rel_prime_sym. apply Zdivide_intro with (q := c). apply Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_bezout. apply bezout_rel_prime. apply rel_prime_le_prime with (p := Z.gcd a b). apply prime_gcd. split. apply Z.divide_pos_le. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zis_gcd_rel_prime. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zgcd_is_gcd.
